examples.example: 今天的天气挺好，非常适合出去游玩。

translate.english: Today's weather is quite good and it is very suitable for going out to play.

examples.example: 我的生活现在过得挺好，每天都很充实快乐。

translate.english: My life is going quite well now, and every day is full and happy.

examples.example: 这次考试我发挥得挺好，心里特别高兴。

translate.english: I performed quite well in this exam and I am extremely happy in my heart.
